4.4.1. 2D Materials¶

4.4.1.1. Transition Metal Dichalcogenides¶

Module for TMD 2D Materials

class SemiPy.Devices.Materials.TwoDMaterials.TMD.MoS2(*args, **kwargs)[source]¶

Bases: SemiPy.Devices.Materials.TwoDMaterials.TwoDMaterial.TwoDMaterial, SemiPy.Devices.Materials.BaseMaterial.Semiconductor

The material MoS2. Single layer thickness is 0.615 nm taken from Roscoe G. Dickinson, Linus Pauling. Journal of the American Chemical Society; 1923.

single_layer_thickness = 0.615¶
